recipesJson.name: Glam Jam Pie
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
This is a Yummy dark Jammy berry pie using Theo from @thefogvlog, Mixed Berry Jam.  This Jam is black Berries / blueberries with a hit of Strawberry. Its super gooey and sticky - with a nice round mouthfeel. Not overly sweet - but somewhat sweetish. (Theo's description).  
I took his Mixed Berry Jam and added .25% of  **FLV Boysenberry** for the inside of the pie.  The pie Crust is **FA Graham Crust** and **FA Pastry Zest**.
